CustomField.formula: IF( LastModifiedDate - CreatedDate > 0 , TEXT( FLOOR( LastModifiedDate - CreatedDate ) ) & " days " & TEXT( FLOOR( MOD( (LastModifiedDate - CreatedDate ) * 24, 24 ) ) ) & " hours " & TEXT( ROUND( MOD( (LastModifiedDate - CreatedDate ) * 24 * 60, 60 ), 0 ) ) & " minutes", "" )
CustomField.label: Age
